name: Subwoofer-Bot
description:
Play as a robot who shoots sound waves, defeat the weird gelatine enemies and advance deeper and deeper. Your enemies will be resistant to higher sounds, make sure to shoot deep ones!

Made by:

Bxan, Joaquín Gonzalez (Art & Game Design) https://twitter.com/j4j4j4go

Sabasa, Iñaki Diez (Programming & Game Design) https://sabasa.itch.io/

Lucio Ruixo (Programming & Game Design) https://lucioruixo.itch.io/
